title: Google Voice is one of the first apps adding support for Android’s new image picker
dc:creator: Ben Schoon
description:
With the release of Android 13, Google debuted a new image picker for Android that’s also available on older versions of the operating system. With a recent update, Google Voice is adding support for that new photo picker.

more…

The post Google Voice is one of the first apps adding support for Android’s new image picker appeared first on 9to5Google.
